impact-statement: Functional analysis of filopodia by specific interference with their formation and distribution reveals a critical role in conferring intracellular polarity and in controlling the dynamic properties of chemokine-guided cell migration in vivo.

competing-interest.conf1: The authors declare that no competing interests exist.
